briefdescription.para: Align detected face to average face according to landmark.

parameterdescription.para: Output of MTMN with box and landmark

simplesect.para: ESP_OK Input face is good for recognition
ESP_FAIL Input face is not good for recognition

parameterdescription.para: Size of list, one list contains one vector

briefdescription.para: Initialize face id list with name.

parameterdescription.para: Size of list, one list contains one vector

briefdescription.para: Run the face recognition model to get the face feature.

parameterdescription.para: A 56x56x3 image, the variable need to do align_face first

briefdescription.para: Match face with the id_list, and return matched_id.
Match face id with the id_list, and return matched face id node.
Produce face id according to the input aligned face, and save it to dest_id.

parameterdescription.para: Confirm times for each face id enrollment

simplesect.para: >=1 The left piece of aligned faces should be input

briefdescription.para: Produce face id according to the input aligned face, and save the id-name pairs to dest_id.

parameterdescription.para: A face id that need to be enrolled
name corresponding to the face id

simplesect.para: int8_t The left piece of aligned faces should be input
uint8_t The number of IDs remaining in face id list
